mapper.select: SELECT L.*, M.USER_ID AS "REPORTER", W.USER_ID AS "WRITER" FROM POLICE_CMT L JOIN MEMBER M ON L.USER_NO=M.USER_NO JOIN (SELECT P.PC_NO, M.USER_ID FROM POLICE_CMT P JOIN SOLUTION_CMT S ON P.SC_NO=S.SC_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) W ON L.PC_NO = W.PC_NO ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
